room_title: Escape room "Cryptic Cay" by Nexus Escape Room in Miami
review: This wasn't just any ordinary escape room. It was truly an escape room experience! My husband and I drove 4 hours to visit Nexus and I'm so glad that we did. The owners were very friendly and accommodating.The Cryptic Cay room was absolutely incredible. The room was authentically and creatively decorated. There's actually a real airplane body in the room. No joke! These people are seriously committed to providing an amazing experience.I don't want to give any other details away but just trust me! You'll love Nexus Escape Rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Cryptic Cay" by Nexus Escape Room in Miami
review: Amazing experience! The owners were very friendly and professional. We were there for the grand opening celebration. Had a blast doing the Cryptic Cay room. I can't wait to try the next one. Would definitely recommend to anyone in the area looking for a fun night out.

room_title: Escape room "Cryptic Cay" by Nexus Escape Room in Miami
review: Best escape room in South Florida! I've had fun with my family trying to figure out the clues in the Cryptic Cay. The staff is extremely nice and don't limit the clues. Extra points for the steampunk aesthetic. Definitely will return when they finish building the rest of the rooms. Check it out!
